verses.verse: And it shall be <WH935>, when thou art come in unto the land <WH776> which Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430> giveth <WH5414> thee for an inheritance <WH5159>, and possessest <WH3423> it <WH3427>, and dwellest therein,

that thou shalt take <WH3947> of the first <WH7225> of all the fruit <WH6529> of the ground <WH127>, which thou shalt bring <WH935> in from thy land <WH776> that Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430> giveth <WH5414> thee <WH7760>; and thou shalt put it in a basket <WH2935>, and shalt go <WH1980> unto the place <WH4725> which Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430> shall choose <WH977>, to cause his name <WH8034> to dwell there <WH7931>.

And thou shalt come <WH935> unto the priest <WH3548> that shall be in those days <WH3117>, and say <WH559> unto him <WH5046>, I profess this day <WH3117> unto Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430>, that I am come <WH935> unto the land <WH776> which Jehovah <WH3068> sware <WH7650> unto our fathers <WH1> to give us <WH5414>.
And the priest <WH3548> shall take <WH3947> the basket <WH2935> out of thy hand <WH3027>, and set it down <WH3240> before <WH6440> the altar <WH4196> of Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430>.

And thou shalt answer <WH6030> and say <WH559> before <WH6440> Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430>, A Syrian <WH761> ready to perish <WH6> was my father <WH1>; and he went down <WH3381> into Egypt <WH4714>, and sojourned <WH1481> there <WH4592>, few in <WH4962> number <WH1471>; and he became there a nation, great <WH1419>, mighty <WH6099>, and populous <WH7227>.
And the Egyptians <WH4713> dealt <WH7489> ill with us <WH6031>, and afflicted us <WH5414>, and laid upon us hard <WH7186> bondage <WH5656>:

and we cried <WH6817> unto Jehovah <WH3068>, the God <WH430> of our fathers <WH1>, and Jehovah <WH3068> heard <WH8085> our voice <WH6963>, and saw <WH7200> our affliction <WH6040>, and our toil <WH5999>, and our oppression <WH3906>;

and Jehovah <WH3068> brought us forth <WH3318> out of Egypt <WH4714> with a mighty <WH2389> hand <WH3027>, and with an outstretched <WH5186> arm <WH2220>, and with great <WH1419> terribleness <WH4172>, and with signs <WH226>, and with wonders <WH4159>;
and he hath brought <WH935> us into this place <WH4725>, and hath given <WH5414> us this land <WH776>, a land <WH776> flowing <WH2100> with milk <WH2461> and honey <WH1706>.

And now <WH935>, behold, I have brought the first <WH6529> of the fruit of the ground <WH127>, which thou <WH3068>, O Jehovah, hast given <WH5414> me <WH3240>. And thou shalt set it down before <WH6440> Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430>, and worship <WH7812> before <WH6440> Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430>:

and thou shalt rejoice <WH8055> in all the good <WH2896> which Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430> hath given <WH5414> unto thee <WH1004>, and unto thy house, thou <WH3881>, and the Levite, and the sojourner <WH1616> that is in the midst of thee <WH7130>.

When thou hast made an end <WH3615> of tithing <WH6237> all the tithe <WH4643> of thine increase <WH8393> in the third <WH7992> year <WH8141>, which is the year <WH8141> of tithing <WH4643>, then thou shalt give <WH5414> it unto the Levite <WH3881>, to the sojourner <WH1616>, to the fatherless <WH3490>, and to the widow <WH490>, that they may eat <WH398> within thy gates <WH8179>, and be filled <WH7646>.

And thou shalt say <WH559> before <WH6440> Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430>, I have put away <WH1197> the hallowed things <WH6944> out of my house <WH1004>, and also have given <WH5414> them unto the Levite <WH3881>, and unto the sojourner <WH1616>, to the fatherless <WH3490>, and to the widow <WH490>, according to all thy commandment <WH4687> which thou hast commanded <WH6680> me <WH5674>: I have not transgressed any of thy commandments <WH4687>, neither have I forgotten them <WH7911>:

I have not eaten <WH398> thereof in my mourning <WH205>, neither have I put away <WH1197> thereof <WH2931>, being unclean, nor given <WH5414> thereof for the dead <WH4191>: I have hearkened <WH8085> to the voice <WH6963> of Jehovah <WH3068> my God <WH430>; I have done <WH6213> according to all that thou hast commanded me <WH6680>.

Look down <WH8259> from thy holy <WH6944> habitation <WH4583>, from heaven <WH8064>, and bless <WH1288> thy people <WH5971> Israel <WH3478>, and the ground <WH127> which thou hast given <WH5414> us <WH7650>, as thou swarest unto our fathers <WH1>, a land <WH776> flowing <WH2100> with milk <WH2461> and honey <WH1706>.

This day <WH3117> Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430> commandeth <WH6680> thee to do <WH6213> these statutes <WH2706> and ordinances <WH4941>: thou shalt therefore keep <WH8104> and do <WH6213> them with all thy heart <WH3824>, and with all thy soul <WH5315>.

Thou hast avouched <WH559> Jehovah <WH3068> this day <WH3117> to be thy God <WH430>, and that thou wouldest walk <WH3212> in his ways <WH1870>, and keep <WH8104> his statutes <WH2706>, and his commandments <WH4687>, and his ordinances <WH4941>, and hearken <WH8085> unto his voice <WH6963>:

and Jehovah <WH3068> hath avouched <WH559> thee this day <WH3117> to be a people <WH5971> for his own possession <WH5459>, as he hath promised <WH1696> thee <WH8104>, and that thou shouldest keep all his commandments <WH4687>;

and to make <WH5414> thee high <WH5945> above all nations <WH1471> that he hath made <WH6213>, in praise <WH8416>, and in name <WH8034>, and in honor <WH8597>; and that thou mayest be a holy <WH6918> people <WH5971> unto Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430>, as he hath spoken <WH1696>.
